review_and_appreciate:
Review and Appreciate: How well did you follow the steps last week? Give yourself credit for your successes
  and hold the intention to improve - where you fell short. Remember why you are striving to be on The Path!
quote:
"Never underestimate the power of dreams and the influence of the human spirit. We are all the same in this
  notion: The potential for greatness lives within each of us." Wilma Rudolph

step_of_the_day.title:
Finding your intention and motivation to stay on The Path; whatever your dreams, or goals in life, start
  with intention and your motivation (Pillars #1-9)
step_of_the_day.content:
As we start week 29, take time today to remember what's most important in your life. It might be in your own
  personal development, in your relationships as well as in your career. It might simply be what will make you
  happy. Whatever you identify as important, what are you willing to give in order to achieve these
  objectives? What time and effort are you willing to commit? Making this commitment and following through is
  what puts you on The Path to success.

action_step:
Meditate on what is important to you. Then determine how important, by deciding how much time and effort you
  will put in to achieving these important aspects of your life. (Such as 15 minutes a day to practice a
  relaxation exercise.) Then, create an intention around these important goals. Also, create affirmations, or
  "as if" statements written as if you have already achieved them. Keep these affirmations with you and read
  and meditate on them throughout the day as well as when you awaken, and when you go to sleep.
journal_entry: Write about your commitments and how you plan to follow through.
